sourcesContent: query($page: Int){ entries: allNews(perPage: 10, page: $page, sortBy: "created", order: DESC, filter: {category: { id: {in: ["farming"]}}}) @paginate{ totalCount pageInfo { totalPages currentPage } edges { node { id tags{ id title path } excerpt category{ id title } image(width:800) path humanTime : created(format:"DD MMM YYYY") datetime : created } } } topics: allNewsTag{ edges{ node{ title } } } }
